1.title: Trisal
1.plot: In Porto Alegre the couple Bard and Fairy are together for twelve years living an open marriage six. Experienced many loving arrangements not monogamous and now live an exciting polyamorous relationship with Aline.

2.title: Rede Relações Livres
2.plot: Marilia is Leo's girlfriend , who has been dating Aline, who has been dating Daniel, who has been dating the Salette. They are part of the collective Free Relations Network (RLi - Rede de Relações Livres) and talk about how they experience non exclusive love relationships.

3.title: Poliamor
3.plot: In São Paulo, two young couples break the rules of romantic love and experience live a relationship without sexual and emotional exclusivity.

4.title: Casamento a três
4.plot: Audhrey and Eustace were married at young age, had a child and then separated. Years later, when Eustaquio was well married to Ritoca, They got closer again and the three decided to live a wedding that has been lasting for eight years.

5.title: Casamento aberto
5.plot: In Sao Paulo, two couples live a stable and open marriage where partners agree that sex with other people are not considered infidelity and can be lived with them together or apart.

6.title: Poliamoristas
6.plot: Sharlenn is dating Rafael and hook up with Ádamo and is engaged to Will, Juliana' husband, who is also date Sharlenn sometimes. They believe that happiness in love relationships you can't find in a single person and you can establish emotional bonds with more than one partner in a consensual manner.

7.title: Poliafetividade
7.plot: Two different love stories involving three or more people. A couple of São Paulo found a third person and lives a poliaffection trio closed and polyamory couple in Rio de Janeiro that relates to other people, consensually.

8.title: Morando a três
8.plot: In Buenos Aires, Luzand Joseph have been living together for eighteen years and have always lived a free relationship. Eight years ago Joaquim arrived and the three live together in poliaffection union open to other experiences.

9.title: Amores múltiplos
9.plot: Three couples speak about the pleasures and difficulties in living non-monogamous relationships, where everyone is free to establish other affective and sexual ties.

10.title: Swing
10.plot: Five couples talk about their sexual experiences with the joint exchange partners. They are stories involving strong emotional relationships and very sexually liberated.

imdb.plot outline: Documentary series in 10 episodes about different forms of love. A man and a woman who are married to live an exclusive relationship seems to be a model which no longer includes the multiplicity of feelings, sensations and desires in contemporary relationships. But what are the types of unconventional love that exist? How to define these new ways of relating? The series brings the viewer the reality of couples and trisais different cities in Brazil and South America who have dared to invent and live new loving arrangements .
imdb.title: Amores Livres
plot: Documentary series in 10 episodes about different forms of love. A man and a woman who are married to live an exclusive relationship seems to be a model which no longer includes the multiplicity of feelings, sensations and desires in contemporary relationships. But what are the types of unconventional love that exist? How to define these new ways of relating? The series brings the viewer the reality of couples and trisais different cities in Brazil and South America who have dared to invent and live new loving arrangements .::João Jardim
